flavorText:
"Hear me, stone, root, branch: be the fist of this land. Turn back those who trample upon your domain."

foreignData.flavorText: „Hört mich an, ihr Steine, Wurzeln und Blätter: Seid die Rächer dieses Landes. Schlagt jene zurück, die euch missachten." —Lied der Wandler
foreignData.name: Wandelnder Wildwuchs
foreignData.text: Immer wenn eine Kreatur, die du kontrollierst, erkundet, lege eine +1/+1-Marke auf den Wandelnden Wildwuchs und du erhältst 3 Lebenspunkte dazu.

foreignData.flavorText: "Escuchen, piedra, rama y raíz: sean el puño de esta tierra. Hagan retroceder a aquellos que pisotean sus dominios". —Canción del moldeador

foreignData.flavorText: « Racines, branches et rocs : défendez ce pays. Faites des repentis de ceux qui vous estoquent. » —Chant du modeleur

foreignData.flavorText: "Pietra, radice e ramo, ascoltatemi: siate il pugno di questa terra. Scacciate chi vorrebbe calpestare i vostri domini." —Canto dei plasmatori

name: Wildgrowth Walker
originalText: Whenever a creature you control explores, put a +1/+1 counter on Wildgrowth Walker and you gain 3 life.

rulings.text: If a creature leaves the battlefield before an effect instructs it to explore, it still explores. Effects that trigger when a creature you control explores, such as that of Wildgrowth Walker, trigger if appropriate.
If Wildgrowth Walker leaves the battlefield while its triggered ability is on the stack, you won’t put a +1/+1 counter on anything but you will gain 3 life.

text: Whenever a creature you control explores, put a +1/+1 counter on Wildgrowth Walker and you gain 3 life.
